sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEEPLE, an appendage erected generally on the weſtern end of churches, to hold the bells. Steeples are denominated from their form, either ſpires or towers: the firſt are ſuch as aſcend continually diminiſhing either conically or pyramidally ; the latter are mere parallelo- pipeds, and are covered a-top platform-like.
